page.title: 04Famous people
page.content: Here are the names of some famous people who come from this area. Nick Hayward lived in Copers Cope Road. David Bowie lived in Southend Road and started his career in the back of a Beckenam pub ,"The Three Tuns". Rolf Harris used to live in Sydenham. The Rolling Stones used to rehearse in a Penge Pub called "The Palmerstone".Enid Blyton was a pupil at St Christophers school,Beckenham. Bob Monkhouse was born in Beckenham. Malcolm Muggeridge,a famous television presenter lived in Beckenham. Alan Minter,middleweight boxing champion of the world was born in Penge. Bill Wyman(born Parks)was born in Blenheim Road ,Penge.
